mapper.select: /* goodsListMapper.selectDetailGoods */ SELECT GD_NO as gdNo ,GD_GP as gdGp ,GD_SP as gdSp ,GD_NM as gdNm ,GD_CNT as gdCnt ,GD_PAGE as gdPage ,GD_THICK as gdThick ,GD_WR as gdWr ,GD_PB as gdPb ,GD_DC as gdDc ,GD_YN as gdYn ,GD_PRICE as gdPrice ,GD_IMG as gdImg ,GD_DETL as gdDetl ,GD_DETLNM as gdDetlNm FROM GOODS_INFO WHERE GD_NO = #{gdNo}
